snippet: Richard Gasquet of France, the defending champion, defeated Marcos Baghdatis of Cyprus, 6-4, 6-4, to reach the semifinals of the Open Sud de France in Montpellier.
abstract: Richard Gasquet beats Marcos Baghdatis in Open Sud de France quarterfinals; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Richard Gasquet of France, the defending champion, defeated Marcos Baghdatis of Cyprus, 6-4, 6-4, to reach the semifinals of the Open Sud de France in Montpellier.
